author: Shobna Gulati
title: Actress, Presenter, Writer
desc: I would describe my experiences at RH London on Walton Street, as time very well spent. My concerns and desires for how I want my hair and face to look always listened to. I completely love sitting in the chair with Melinda she is an expert colourist and Vincent always makes my hair look wonderful for a special occasion “ do”, Armand a total talent in creating my overall look and helping my confidence soar. A place where I am comfortable, feel safe and well looked after. It’s definitely a 5-star visit treat for me when I’m in London.

author: Clair Charles
title: Eloise St. - Made In Chelsea
desc: RH London is hands down the best salon I’ve visited. Each staff member is unbelievably talented and they are so attentive and professional. More importantly, they are such a genuine and fun team, I would spend all day chatting away with them if I could! I’ve never been happier with my hair and the chilled vibe makes for the best experience. I would highly recommend!

author: April Bandbury
title: Ms. Great Britain 2020/21
desc: The best service. So grateful to Daniel for transforming my box dyed lockdown hair. Beyond happy with the result. A beautiful salon and a wonderful experience. Can’t wait to return.
